text: Ursula M. Burns (born 20 September 1958) is an American businesswoman. She was the CEO of Xerox from 2009 to 2017. Burns was the first African American woman to be CEO of the company. She was listed as the 14th most powerful woman in the world in 2009 by Forbes . Burns is from Manhattan, New York. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:American chief executives Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Ursula Burns
